## Return Value

The size of the post-transformation entry from a [doc://com.apple.metal/documentation/Metal/MTL4CounterHeap] of type [doc://com.apple.metal/documentation/Metal/MTL4CounterHeapType].

## Discussion

In order to use the data available in a [doc://com.apple.metal/documentation/Metal/MTL4CounterHeap], your app first resolves it either in the CPU timeline or in the GPU timeline. When your app calls [doc://com.apple.metal/documentation/Metal/MTL4CommandBuffer/resolveCounterHeap:withRange:intoBuffer:waitFence:updateFence:] to resolve counter data in the GPU timeline, Metal writes the data into a [doc://com.apple.metal/documentation/Metal/MTLBuffer].

During this process, Metal transform the data in the heap into a format consisting of entries of the size that this method advertises, based on the [doc://com.apple.metal/documentation/Metal/MTL4CounterHeapType].

# size(ofCounterHeapEntry:)

**Instance Method**

Returns the size, in bytes, of each entry in a counter heap of a specific counter heap type when your app resolves it into a usable format.

## Declaration

```swift
func size(ofCounterHeapEntry type: MTL4CounterHeapType) -> Int
```

## Parameters

- **type**: [doc://com.apple.metal/documentation/Metal/MTL4CounterHeapType] value that represents the type of the [doc://com.apple.metal/documentation/Metal/MTL4CounterHeap] to resolve.

## Return Value

The size of the post-transformation entry from a [doc://com.apple.metal/documentation/Metal/MTL4CounterHeap] of type [doc://com.apple.metal/documentation/Metal/MTL4CounterHeapType].

## Discussion

In order to use the data available in a [doc://com.apple.metal/documentation/Metal/MTL4CounterHeap], your app first resolves it either in the CPU timeline or in the GPU timeline. When your app calls [doc://com.apple.metal/documentation/Metal/MTL4CommandBuffer/resolveCounterHeap:withRange:intoBuffer:waitFence:updateFence:] to resolve counter data in the GPU timeline, Metal writes the data into a [doc://com.apple.metal/documentation/Metal/MTLBuffer].

During this process, Metal transform the data in the heap into a format consisting of entries of the size that this method advertises, based on the [doc://com.apple.metal/documentation/Metal/MTL4CounterHeapType].
